name: Only One Love
description:
Only One Love is a submission for the GMTK game jam 2019.

This is dating-sim where each time you play, potential dates are procedurally generated. This mainly includes the 'interests' of that person.

Based upon our old friend RNG,  you could potentially date multiple people before finding your 'true love'.

Only One person is your 'true love', you've got too meet her and try to go on a date with her. Your 'true love' will always have the same 'interests' as you. ('Interests' are displayed in-game.)

The game is played by mouse.

Thank's for checking out this game, I really appreciate it.
